bibl.title: The Author of P.Oxy. LXXXIII 5349 as a Reader of Empedocles
bibl.seg: Ben Cartlidge, The Author of P.Oxy. LXXXIII 5349 as a Reader of Empedocles.

Empedocles B35.4 D.-K. provides a model for line 5 of P. Oxy. LXXXIII, 5349 (= MP3 1874.001; LDAB 768445), a fragment of didactic poetry on an astronomical subject. Proposes to restore φορῆται in P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 (= MP3 356.11; LDAB 824), a(ii)19 = Physika 1.289.
bibl.note: Empedocles B35.4 D.-K. provides a model for line 5 of P. Oxy. LXXXIII, 5349 (= MP3 1874.001; LDAB 768445), a fragment of didactic poetry on an astronomical subject. Proposes to restore φορῆται in P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 (= MP3 356.11; LDAB 824), a(ii)19 = Physika 1.289.
